Text: Thanks for uploading all these great episodes. Hope you can help with the final volume, too.

I've got the second volume (eps. 16-30), again as mkv files of about 450 MB each, and will soon start to upload them - stay tuned!

Best regards,
Soundtrekker

P.S. rKimble, I got your message over at... you know where! I'll drop you a note over there later, or here on the bay!
